description: Amendments to planning permission dated 2nd February 2023 (RN:22/07938/FULL) for Erection of extension at the lower ground floor level; replacement of bay  window at lower ground floor level with timber French double door; creation of a ground floor balcony with a lightweight metal stair forming access from ground floor level to the garden below; changes to the fenestration of the closet wing elevation including new window to rear elevation and adapting the existing window to form a door opening to provide access to the new balcony; installation of air conditioning unit within front vault NAMELY, widening of rear lower-ground floor door, retainment of existing bay window and lowering its cil to form full height window and door, raising the height of the doors at the lower ground floor level and a slimline heritage double glazed unit instead of a single glazing in the new kitchen window.
